TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kin_lwan, title = Kin_lwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kin_lwan} }

S.FORM: Kin lwan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Kin lwan a niyaro', 54 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 183 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 172 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 91%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.

Kin lwan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Kin lwan a niyaro', 54 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 183 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 172 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 11 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 91%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.
